hello everyone: how can I change my themes back to metacity themes? I tried compiz and now I can't have the effects and the default ubuntu theme at the same time
are you missing window borders completely?
no I don't. I simply have the compiz/emerald themes instead of the default themes
the default uses gtk-window-decorator which displays the gtk themes...
I typed "gtk-window-decorator --replace" in the terminal and now I have the GTK themes. Thanks!
